All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary 
    Class Description
    AccountPayment
    Account payment of a user save user and his payment method provides getters and setter for payments method
    AddScreensController  
    AddVBoxController  
    AnalysisViewRowController
    AnalysisViewRowController used as a controller for the AnalysisRow FXMl the row contains the survey information and the button to fetch and display the survey file initRow must be called before initializing the row
    AnalyzeAnswersController
    AnalyzeAnswersController used as a controller class for the AnalyzeAnswersScreen FXML needs to be initializes with surveyID and surveyName to work allows the user to upload a file to the DB as a reort for the survey
    AnswerRowController
    used as a controller for the AnswerRow FXML that is used to display a row of a survey for the user to view the answers for it Must be initialized with surveyID and surveyName to work
    Branch
    branch save location of branch and it's manager id provides setters and getters for branch
    Cart
    Cart save ProductsBase objects can only have one cart(singleton)
    CartController
    Cart screen controller class
    CartHBox
    Component class of cart, is used in the cartScreen to represent a ProductsBase which is in the cart.
    CartProductOverviewEditVBox
    Component for editing a customProduct's items and products in the cart.
    CartProductOverviewItemVBox
    Controller for item overview which is used in the cart screen.
    CartProductOverviewNoEditVBox
    A component for viewing a product overview in the cart.
    CartProductOverviewVBox
    A Father Component class for overview vboxes - set basic Product information in the VBox.
    CatalogController
    Controller for catalog screen - Display all the items and products from the database and let the customer add them to their cart.
    CatalogDiscountVBox
    Component that displays one of the most discounted products.
    CatalogItemVBox
    Component for the catalog - Display item And +- buttons for the quantity.
    CatalogProductVBox
    Component for the catalog - Display product details, price and discount.
    CatalogVBox
    Component for displaying a ProductsBase in the catalog grid.
    CheckoutController  
    ClientController
    ClientController extends the superclass AbstractClient for implementing and overriding the functions for our server-client project (zli)
    ClientFormController
    ClientFormController will handle all the events from the gui
    ClientMessageController
    This class will help us the control all the messages that the client and the server sending.
    ClientScreen  
    Commands
    Commands defined between server and client
    Complaint
    Complaint saves a information about complaint status Each complaint has the id user of the employee who handles it.
    ComplaintViewController
    controller class for customerComplaintView
    CustomerComplaintController
    this class is used as a controller for the CustomerComplaintScreen.fxml
    CustomerComplaintHomeController
    CustomerComplaintHomeController used as a controller class for the CustomerComplaintHomeScreen.fxml
    CustomerOrderView
    CustomerOrderView used to contain all the data required to display an order for the customer
    CustomProduct
    CustomProduct
    CustomProductBuilderController
    This class displays the "Create custom product" screen.
    CustomProductHBox
    Father component class for hboxes in custom product builder screen.
    customProductSuccessfulController
    Popup controller class for displaying after a successful creation and addition of a custom product to the cart.
    DeliveriesOrders
    Deliveries orders saves the order id and the delivery id Provides getters and setters
    Delivery
    Delivery saves receiver information and status of delivery Provides setters and getters
    DeliveryController  
    DeliveryCoordinatorController
    DeliveryCoordinatorController class is used as a controller class for the DeliveryCoordinatorScreen fxml file
    DeliveryCoordinatorView
    DeliveryCoordinatorView used to contain all the data used by the delivery coordinator for a single order
    DeliveryDetailsDeliveryVBoxController  
    DeliveryDetailsPickupVBoxController  
    FilesHandler
    This class helps us to save the file that given from the server from the blob table after uploading the pdf file.
    GreetingCardController  
    GreetingCardVBoxController  
    HistogramReportController
    This class displays the complaints or income histogram report after receiving the data from the ReportController.
    HomeGuestController
    Guest Home Screen - Allowing to Exit And To Start A Purchase
    HomeUserTypesController
    User Home Screen - Allowing to Exit,Logout and Use Given Options
    HomeVBox
    [VBox] User card(VBox function as button) and icon that shows on user home screen
    ICatalogVBox
    Interface for AbstractFactory
    ICustomProductHBox
    Interface for custom product hbox abstract factory.
    InputChecker
    This class checking the input that given by the user in the screens.
    Item
    Item saves all products base attributes
    ItemDetailsVBox
    Popup for displaying an Item's details.
    LandingScreenController
    Controller for landing screen - This screen shows a random welcome message to the user after he connects
    LoginScreenController
    Login screen allowing to login to user that registered in the system
    MailService
    Using this class, the application can send emails (for exmaple: if the manager accepted the order, and etc).
    ManageCatalogController
    This class controllers all the functionality of the manageCatalog.
    ManageClients
    Handle common actions for all clients
    ManageCustomerOrdersController
    ManageCustomerOrdersController used as a controller for the manager order view screen operated by the ManageCustomerOrders FXML file
    ManageData  
    ManageHomeVBoxController  
    ManagerOrderView
    ManagerOrderView saves view a row of orders Provides setters and getters
    ManageScreens
    Controlling flow of screens
    ManageUsers
    Manage users save specific user details Provides setters and getters
    ManageUsersController
    ManageUsersController used as a controller for the manageUsers.fxml file this class allows a manager to suspend and re-activate a customer account
    ManageUsersPermissionController  
    Messages
    Commands defined the messages for the notification center.
    newProductBuilderController
    newProductBuilderController is a controller class for the NewProduct FXML file is is used to create a new product or item to add to the catalog
    Notification
    Notification saves user id and notifications attributes Provides setters and getters
    NotificationController
    notification controller is used to initialize the notification panel in the home screen for the users
    NotificationManager
    this class is used to manage all the notifications generated by the sever and the client
    NotificationRowController
    used to control a single row of a notification, controls the NotificationRow FXML file
    NotificationType  
    Order
    Order saves order attributes,user,payment and branch Provides setters and getters
    OrderCustomProduct
    OrderCustomProduct saves CustomProduct and attributes Provides setter and Getters
    OrderItem
    OrderItem saves idOrder,item and quantity Provides setters and getters
    OrderProduct
    OrderProduct saves idOrder,product and quantity Provides setters and getters
    OrderProductRowController
    OrderProductRowController is used to control a single product row in the orderView FxmlFile it controls an OrderProductRow FXML file must be initialized with a product and a quantity before loading
    orderRowController
    orderRowController used to control an orderRow FXML file, it needs to be initialized with a CustomerOrderView and ViewOrdersController to run when initialized
    OrderRowController
    used to load a row for the delivery coordinator screen
    OrderSummaryHBox  
    PaymentSuccessfulController  
    PopupReportController
    This class displays the income or orders report after receiving the data from the ReportController.
    Product
    Product saves flowerType,productDescription and items Provides setters and getters
    ProductBuilderItemRowController
    This class init the row in the adding new product to select items for the new product in the manageCatalog screen.
    ProductDetailsController
    Controller class for product details popup.
    ProductEditorController
    This controller displays to the user the product that he selected in the manage catalog.
    ProductEditSuccessfulController
    Popup controller class for displaying after a successful edit of a product/custom product.
    ProductOverviewEditHBox
    Component class for product overview with edit - adds +- buttons and a remove button.
    ProductOverviewNoEditHBox
    Component class for displaying items of a product.
    ProductsBase
    Product base save attributes Provides getters and Setters
    ProductVBoxController
    This controller helps to init the products/items in the manageCatalog Screen.
    QuestionAnswer
    QuestionAnswer used as an entity to contain all the information needed from a survey question with its answers
    QuestionAnswerRowController
    QuestionAnswerRowController used as a controller for the QuestionAnswerRow FXML, it loads the survey questions answers and shows the average grade for the question
    questionHBox
    questionHBox extends a regular HBox and contains a question entity, the label for the question and the radio buttons to get the selected answer
    RegistrationController
    used as a controller class for the RegistrationScreen FXML allows to register a new customer into the system
    Report
    This class saves the data of the report after receiving the information from the database.
    ReportsController
    This class controllers the functionality of the view reports.
    Screens
    Screen the defined for client in the system
    SelectedHBox
    Component class for a selected product/item in the right side of custom product builder.
    SelectorHBox
    Component class for a selector product/item in the left side of custom product builder.
    SingletonOrder
    SingletonOrder saves Delivery attributes GreetingCard and singleton attribute Provides Setters and Getters
    SplashScreenController
    Controller for loading screen - This screen is used for loading all the major screens in the application.
    Status
    User(client) status in the system
    Survey
    Survey saves SurveyQuestion and attributes Provides setters and getters
    SurveyAnalysisFile
    SurveyAnalysisFile saves file attributes Provides Setters and Getters
    SurveyAnalysisViewHomeController
    SurveyAnalysisViewHomeController used as controller for the SurveyReportsHomeScreen FXML file loads all the surveys that have reports uploaded for them and allows the user to open the uploaded file
    SurveyAnswersHomeController
    SurveyAnswersHomeController used to show the surveys that are available in the system
    SurveyController  
    SurveyHomeController
    SurveyHomeController used as a controller class to the SurveyHomeScreen FXML file and is used to display all the surveys available for the user to fill
    SurveyHomeRowHBox
    SurveyHomeRowHBox extends HBox represents a row for a survey that can be filled by the user in the survey screen
    SurveyQuestion
    SurveyQuestion saves questionID,surveyID and question Provides setters and getters
    User
    Logged in User(singleton) in the current system
    UserDetails
    UserDetails saves attributes Provides Setters and Getters
    UserType
    Types of user in the system
    ViewOrdersController
    ViewOrdersController as a controller class for the ViewOrdersScreen FXML to allow the customer to view his orders and cancel them the customer is presented with all of his orders
